1.0.name: wordpress/easy-page-templates-info
1.0.description: If you are a WordPress theme developer, this little plugin is a great tool for you. It will add a new column next to page title in WP-Admin->Pages, and let you know what template file is used for every page. Also, it makes possible to filter pages by registred template files in the system (please see Screenshots section to see it in action).
